name: We Can Be Heroes
description: When alien invaders capture the Earth's superheroes, their kids must learn to work together to save their parents and the planet.

review.author: samratsingraur
review.heading: We cannot be heroes!
review.reviewBody: The movie takes you back to the world of sharkboy and lavagirl but fails to be what we expected it to be. It's a kid movie and they may love it but definitely not for a mature audience. The plot is super predictable and and the CGI is awful. The only good thing about this film is Pedro Pascal.

keywords: superhero action,non comic book superhero,female protagonist,alien invasion,heroine
